results.title: Amlodipine alleviates cisplatin-induced nephrotoxicity in rats through gamma-glutamyl transpeptidase (GGT) enzyme inhibition, associated with regulation of Nrf2/HO-1, MAPK/NF-kappaB, and Bax/Bcl-2 signaling
results.text_hl: Consistent with the mitigation of oxidative stress in renal tubular cells, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ afforded a remarkable anti-@<m>DISEASE_Inflammation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ response.

results.title: Amlodipine limits microglia activation and cognitive dysfunction in aged hypertensive mice
results.text_hl: We showed, however, that @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ was able to limit microglia's @<m>DISEASE_Inflammation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ phenotype in other brain regions.

results.title: Improvement in hemodynamics of amlodipine besylate combined with metoprolol in patients with hypertension complicated by heart failure.
results.text_hl: The liver, kidney function and adverse effects outcomes were the same in both groups (P>0.05). @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine besylate@@@ combined with @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@ has a better clinical effect in treating @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ combined with @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@, which can more effectively improve patients' cardiac function, @<m>DISEASE_Inflammation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ and hemodynamics.

results.title: Calcium Antagonist-Induced Gingival Overgrowth: A Case Report and Literature Review.
results.text_hl: Intraoral examination reveals localized @<m>DISEASE_Inflammation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ and tissue enlargement in the papillae areas of the upper arch gingiva, leading to partial covering of the dental crowns.

results.title: Amlodipine and perindopril modulate miR-874-3p expression to regulate ferroptosis-linked LPCAT3/LACS4/GPX4 Axis and gut dysbiosis in metabolic-associated steatohepatitis.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Male Wistar @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were divided into Sham (normal diet), @DISEASE_Fatty_Liver @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@MASH@@@ (high-@CHEMICAL_Fats @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005223 @@@fat@@@, high-sugar diet), @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlo@@@ (@DISEASE_Fatty_Liver @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@MASH@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@), @CHEMICAL_Perindopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020913 @@@Peri@@@ (@DISEASE_Fatty_Liver @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@MASH@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Perindopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020913 @@@perindopril@@@), and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlo@@@+@CHEMICAL_Perindopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020913 @@@Peri@@@ (combination therapy) groups.
